group_1.narration: Leila and her friends invited us to take@part in a "scavenger hunt" quiz game@designed to help kids learn about all kinds@of ingredients used in traditional soup.
Joining is free and we're allowed to create@and eat our own original soup made with@the ingredients we win at the event.
I thought it sounded fun and@decided to participate, but...

group_1.textRight: I wonder...where are the riddles?

group_1.textLeft: Hm... Finding them may end up being more@difficult than I thought.

group_1.textRight: Hmmm... But I don't want to ask for a hint...
...[chara:111700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.5][chara:111500:motion_0][chara:111700:eyeClose_0][chara:111700:cheek_0][chara:111700:face_mtn_ex_020.exp.json][chara:111700:lipSynch_1]Okay, I've decided!

group_1.textLeft: What's the plan?

group_1.textRight: First...we comb this whooole area from top@to bottom!
We might find one of the questions that way.

group_1.textLeft: Very well. I'll follow your lead.

group_1.textRight: Ahh!
*Munch* *Munch* [chara:111700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy][chara:111700:motion_100][chara:111700:lipSynch_1]Wow! How delicious!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, Mitama.

group_1.textRight: Next. Up. Is...♪ It all looks so good,@how to choose?

group_1.textLeft: Are we not looking for the questions?

group_1.textRight: But of course, we're searching right now.

group_1.textLeft: Really?
To me, it seems like you're simply enjoying@a tour of the food stalls.

group_1.textRight: You have much to learn, Kanagi.

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Collecting ingredients is the whole point,@meaning...a hint lies among the food.
That's scavenger hunting 101♪

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... Is that right?

group_1.textRight: Now, on to the next food stall, shall we?

group_1.narration: — Mitama —@(I wonder which is better, the ones here@or the ones I had earlier.)

group_1.textRight: Hmm, these are tasty, too♪ Want to try one?

group_1.textLeft: You got those...because it could be a hint@that will lead us to the questions?

group_1.textRight: Yes, exactly.

group_1.textLeft: Very well, I accept.
*Munch*

group_1.textRight: Well? Great, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it is, but I still fail to see the@connection with our objective.

group_1.narration: Man... I'm in so much trouble.

group_1.textRight: Hm?

group_1.textCenter: We'll never get to have our soup at this@rate.
If only someone would come to our rescue...

group_1.textRight: That man over there, he seems to be glancing@our way quite a bit.

group_1.textLeft: He's being rather theatrical about it, too.

group_1.textRight: Well, not knowing why will bother me,[chara:111700:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:111700:cheek_0][chara:111700:motion_100][chara:111700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:111700:lipSynch_1] so@let's go find out! This could be fun!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]H-hey, Mitama!

group_1.textRight: Excuse me, are you having some trouble?

group_1.textLeft: Ohh! Hi there, young ladies! Would you@give me a hand?

group_1.textRight: Huh? Um...

group_1.textLeft: You see, I'm a fishmonger.
The cod I was going to steam to make fish@paste has gone missing.

group_1.textRight: That IS a problem.

group_1.textLeft: Right... So you nice young ladies'll help a@fella out, right?

group_1.textRight: With what?

group_1.textLeft: The cod, I'm tellin' you, the cod! You'll@find it for me, yeah?

group_1.textRight: ...[wait:0.8][chara:111700:lipSynch_1]The cod.

group_1.textLeft: What's the meaning of this?
Asking such an absurd favor of us...

group_1.textRight: (Absurd... It certainly is out of the@ordinary.)
...Could this be!
Kanagi, this is it! This right here is part@of the event!

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I just knew the food stalls were the right@way to go!♪
Okay, mister fishmonger, we'll go see if@we can find your cod.

group_1.textLeft: You will?!

group_1.textRight: Yes! We'll handle it, no problem!
